quote: Myrna could spend happy hours browsing bookcases. She felt if she could just get a good look at a person’s bookcase and their grocery cart, she’d pretty much know who they were.
quote_letters: MYRNA COULD SPEND HAPPY HOURS BROWSING BOOKCASES SHE FELT IF SHE COULD JUST GET A GOOD LOOK AT A PERSONS BOOKCASE AND THEIR GROCERY CART SHED PRETTY MUCH KNOW WHO THEY WERE
